title: Attitude Change Program Through Animal Behavior and Welfare MOOC

context.additional_context: Short-term intensive mobile learning environment targeting changes in learners' attitudes and behaviors.

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic concepts related to animal welfare
Learners apply animal behavior observation and interpretation methods to analyze real-world cases
Learners develop concrete action plans for improving animal welfare after completing a MOOC
Learners evaluate changes in attitudes toward animal welfare through instructor video content
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
